voted against: an equal number of electors per parliamentary constituency
voted for: transferring more powers to the Senedd/Welsh Parliament
transferring more powers to the Scottish Parliament
fewer MPs in the House of Commons
has never voted on: a more proportional system for electing MPs

consistently voted for: a right to remain for EU nationals already in living in the UK
